One time the alien from the planet jumbdar tickled my brain and i thought to myself, what if i could fly? as i approached the Golden Gate Bridge and was about to jumb, Gabe Newel came to my in a LSD induced dream and said: Behold the son of Geko the Great! I was inspired greatly and burst into tears right there in the road. 

I went home and realized During one of my drug trips I had bought a shirt that said: guess who is the greatest. Then the dream I had had about Gaben made perfect sense. I was to become the father of Geko the Great who would surpass me one day in mind, body and spirit. 

I travelled to Japan with the last of my fleeting Cash and built a raft to travel the Yellow Sea. I awoke in China and as i was currently nursing an electromagnetic hangover i Thought myself to be in Hell. when i came to I realized where i was and decided to take over the Triad AKA The Chinese mafia. Through much trickery i succeded and sold more heroin than anyone in the history of the Triad. However my life was incomplete.

I returned home and with my new drug money i bought half-life and beat it in one sitting. when i turned of my moniter i realized i hadn't slept for 98 hours so i passsed out. I had another dream of Gaben but this time he said: Behold for my son has become great. I then realized, I was Geko The Great. I had won. Nothing can stop me. Nothing.
si me gusto el final estaba bien pro todo estaba bien pro bien top juego del año en mi opinion a favoritos de siempre

The game is GREAT, but it has a major flaw i feel that keeps me from making this a recomendation to EVERYBODY

-The good
This is HALF-LIFE, the grand daddy of all Valve and source games
The game is well crafted and fun
BUSTIN' MAKES ME FEEL GOOD
Despite being released in '98, the game has aged quite well. Some models are a bit outdated, but some of the larger models including the end boss are absolutely gorgeous.

-The bad
My only, major complaint is a big one. Even on Medium, I got stuck multiple times due to the fact that the game is seemingly structured around trial and error. I tried not to look up guides, but eventually some things, especially late game baddies become too overwhelming. 

All in all, if you dont mind giving up a weekend to this wonderful game, and don't mind trying and failing until you get it right, I wholeheartedly recomend it, I beat it in 14 hours and despite frustration, I absolutely loved this game. 10/10

Half-Life marcou minha adolescência e sem dúvida sempre estará entre meus dez jogos favoritos. Se você está lendo isso em 2017 ou em qualquer data posterior e ainda não conhece essa pepita de ouro, trate de comprar agora e se divertir na pele de Gordon Freeman enfrentando fuzileiros navais e toneladas de alienígenas! Os gráficos não são ruins, só não são atuais. A mecânica desse jogo é maravilhosa, e o enredo é muito bom. Eu até li "O Nevoeiro" do Stephen King por causa da influência que causou no jogo. Não vou entrar em detalhes, mas fortemente irei recomendar este ótimo jogo! O único contra de Half-Life, definitivamente é sempre me assustar com os malditos headcrabs! Fora isso, o jogo é impecável.
a classic game every one should own this

Half Life is not only and intresting time capsule for late 90's first person shooters that still remains relevant for those looking for any sort of great FPS (or first person game for that matter) but also one of the greatest games of all time and an experiance I will not soon forget

Half Life from the first moment onwards throws you directly into the shoes of Gordan Freeman, some unspeciefied 20-something scientist whose completely a blank slate for the player to fill with their actions. For this game you are Freeman and Freeman is nothing more than you. This mixes very well with the one of half lifes greatest atributes, the atmosphere.  Half life's level design seems to be based around 1 (3 if you count certain events that split up the map) which gets more strange and exotic the more you venture into it, with gordan (or more acurately you) becoming more and more of a action hero while venturing deeper into the maze. In summary, I think one of the real reasons that Half Life is such a memorable experiance is how it slowly transforms from a grounded alien invasion, to the complete absurdity of the later part of the game, the ending bieng a complete jump into the unknown.

Also the gameplay's pretty good
Half-Life is AWESOME!!!!! BUY IT! NOW!!
[b]Każdy wie dlaczego.[/b]
Um clássico que merece estar na lista de melhores jogos de todos os tempos

So far I've clocked in 3 hours in this game, but I must say this game is so good. The graphics and gameplay hold up even today, and is really a must play for FPS fans. This game pioneered in the FPS genre back in the day, and you can see a lot of elements in modern games. This game also has an intresting choice of having no cut scenes, you control every move which I thought was really cool and different. 

Only Con:
VENT CRAWLING SIMULATOR

Also I should've played this long ago, it's about to be the 20th anniversary.
tem como colocar a skin do Sonic the Hedgehog?

I was aware of half life in the past but i had never actually played it until now (well the only time that i have played was by accident because i wanted to play cs 1.6 and popped half life by accident and that was a long long time ago) now i see what i have been missing out all these years the game is amazing sure its old but it has aged pretty well here are my pros and cons!
Pros:
-Great and Responsive Gameplay.
-Widescreen Support and the graphics are decent (we are talking about a 1998 game after all).
-Awesome Setting with weird and fucked up monsters.
-Chellenging and Tactical at times. 
-Sound Design is amazing.
-There are STILL people playing multiplayer!
Cons:
-The age of the game only shows in the voice of the Characters its not great but passable
Its a shame that i didnt played that earlier, Its one of the best games i ever played !

When I was a little child one of my close friend and I used to escape from primary school to play multiplayer half life in internet cafes which were so famous those years (99-2004). We just randomly used to go those places to just play mp without knowing single player. Such a shame that we had a no clue about it and later every single time even when I hear the word of "Half" it automatically reminds me of Half Life that was our childhood hero and I almost to cry. Neither this review is about the game's  mechanics nor its script. It's just about the guy who had great times and memories with one of his close friend in his childhood. For me besides an original doom and Return to castle wolfenstein, it's best game ever done. My immaculate childhood.
nostalgia  total , o começo de uma grande era de jogos
it is won of the best games iv ever playd

Did not disappoint.

The Linux version is not bug free though, I experienced some texture errors and the game even crashed at one point. But other than that, everything worked great.
I purchased this game just to see what all the praise was about and now I see why. Half Life is a great puzzle, fps game that is challenging and fun. I would recommend this game to anyone.

Neden bilmem ama Half-Life ve modlarının atmosferleri bana hep güzel gelmiştir. Grafikleri şu an için iyi değil, evet. Sonuçta oyun 20 yıllık. Ancak eğlence bakımından (oynadıktan sonra anlıyorsunuz) apayrı bir yeri var. Gerek Singleplayerda olsun gerek Multiplayerda bu oyun gerçek bir efsane. Steam Charts'tan bakıyorum oyuncu sayısı 1000'den aşağı düşmüyor. Eğer hala oynamadıysanız çok şey kaçırıyorsunuz. Valve Complete Pack almanız tavsiyemdir. Üstelik hikaye modunu Sven Co Op adlı bir oyunla (Steam'de bulabilirsiniz) birden fazla kişiyle oynayabilirsiniz.
Multijugador 9/10

Vamos lá, eu amo jogos antigos, eles não se comparam com os de hoje em dia onde a tecnologia era sempre levada ao limite do possivel! Mas na epoca que saiu Half-Life eu não entrei no Hyper-train, conhecia o jogo, tive oportunidades de joga-lo mas nunca o fiz, eu tenho problemas com jogos famosos acabo virando a cara para eles.
Depois de anos finalmente comprei o pack com todos os jogos da franquia e claro que comecei pelo primeiro e acabei de zerar, eu já tinha jogado antes no PS2 e em algumas lan quando não tinha nada para fazer e a internet tinha caido... 
Bem, naquela epoca os FPS estavam numa fase de evolução mas Half-life além dos graficos não faz algo diferente que você possa dizer "minha nossa eu nunca tinha visto em um outro FPS" ainda mas se você já tinha jogado Doom até Duke Nukem 3D... Half-life não te da uma historia tão bem escrita... não me entenda mal... você é um "ninguém" que não tem acesso a nada e só segue ordens de outros cientistas fazendo com que o personagem seja um nada praticamente... ter que ir atrás de outros cientistas só para eles usarem os olhos para abrir uma porta qualquer (tudo bem que isso cria um "puzzle" mas se for ver na estoria do jogo você não é ninguém praticamente)...

Gameplay, mesmo sendo um jogo linear se perder e ficar rodando numa mesma area até achar a passagem é algo comum no jogo, não usei nenhum guia nem nada até chegar em partes onde eu rodava todo o mapa e não achava o lugar para onde devo ir mas isso é comum em jogos antigos e não acho ruim ter isso :3

como a steam não da um meio termo irei marcar como recomendo... mas na verdade esse jogo para mim fica no meio termo, é um jogo 6/10 NA MINHA OPINIÃO! pelo motivo de certas partes serem chatas demais fora que a plataforma nesse jogo é horrivel com partes onde o cenario te atrapalha por ter uma quininha mal coloca e fazendo você bater nela e errar o salto, fora ter que andar em lugares estreitos com a movimentação totalmente oposta, mesmo podendo "andar" é uma droga mesmo assim!

Uma coisa que eu adorei é que esse jogo tem um "bug" engraçado... se você tiver um CD original de musica no drive de DVD o jogo toca as musicas do CD ao inves das musicas do jogo e jogar certas partes ouvindo flashback como Dance,Dance,Dance do Chic na parte inicial do train ou A Taste of Honey - Boogie Oogie Oogie no ultimo boss foi uma das melhores coisas que já experimentei :3
CS的起源游戏，自身的剧情、游戏性与同时代的其它游戏相比也都是优秀的。主角Gordon Freeman只身一人闯过无数阻碍，拯救人类。武器很多样，怪物很恶心，经常吓到我。游戏难度超高，各种迷路，死了无数次，需要经常存档。游戏在V社合集里购买价钱超低，值得一试的老游戏。
This game is a great way to get Into the Half Life series and is very fun to play there is suspense here and there and there are some little spooks that scare you but overall this game is AWESOME

This game is really interesting, it starts off very calm and intoduces you to the Universe your Character (Gordan Freeman) is living in. This is an important part because you are just about to embark on an epic FPS Adventure, fight Aliens, Grunts, and plenty of other fantastic enemies. This game is a classic that changed the FPS Video Game forever, this is a must-buy for any serious Gamers looking to play some Classic FPS, I really hope you buy this Great Game, goodbye!
